name: Oven Baked Popcorn
author: Shirley Drury
instructions: Pour popped corn into a large roaster. Boil remaining ingredi- ents, except baking soda, together for five minutes. Remove from heat and add baking soda. Stir until this quits bubbling. Pour over corn, gradually stirring after each addition to coat the corn. Bake 1 hour at 225Â° stirring every 15 minutes. Store in tight containers. Will keep crisp for several week.
